Pre-Game Insights: Scotland will be expecting to snap their winless streak when they kick off their Euro 2024 preparations against minnows Gibraltar in Portugal.

Whether Gibraltar will provide Scotland a stiff enough test for the hurly burly of the Euros remains to be seen, although manager Steve Clarke will want to get through the game unscathed after striker Lyndon Dykes recently joined a lengthy injury list.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be shown live on Premier Sports 1.
You can watch the match on Premier Sports Player.
talkSPORT 2 is available on DAB radio, and like the BBC, you can tune in via most TV packages.
Others: Gibraltar v Scotland will take place on Monday 3rd June 2024.
Gibraltar v Scotland will kick off at 5pm.
